It features granite countertops coupled with a gorgeous tiled backsplash and a large window that allows natural light to flood in. The primary bedroom is impressive with a large walk-in closet equipped with custom built-in storage and charming barn doors that lead into the luxurious ensuite. The backyard's covered patio is perfectly suited for any summer day. Don't forget to check out the many amenities this neighborhood has to offer including a sparkling pool and fun playground! This home is turnkey and ready for new owners to enjoy.

NEW CONSTRUCTION! Popular open concept home has a dramatic two story entry and family room. It has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms to give your family plenty of space! Multiple offers received - best and final deadline set for 2.8.23 at 9pm. Lovingly maintained, like-new 4 bedroom home in Somerset Park showcases immaculate interiors including dark hardwood floors, neutral paint tones, an abundance of natural light and an expansive, ideal layout. NEW CONSTRUCTION! Popular open concept home has a dramatic two story entry with curved staircase. Family room and kitchen have beautiful, vaulted ceilings. Just as T. S. Eliot changed the way poetry was written, the Eliot changes the way your family lives. The avant-garde design places emphasis on the great room, a light-filled confection overlooking the backyard via a wall of windows. Adults can sip coffee ensconced in a private dining nook while preschoolers play in the sandbox on the covered patio. Too hot outside? It’s “ships, ahoy” in the game room where you’ve installed a rope bridge, ship’s wheel and crow’s nest. They can navigate by the stars you painted on the ceiling. Finish the playdate with a movie in the media room. Then it’s time to relax with Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats and a glass of wine in your lavish primary suite.

NEWLY CONSTRUCTED 5 BDR HOME! Everything looks and feels brand new in this amazing property, located in a beautiful neighborhood. GRAYHAWK FRISCO ISD Huge 5 Bedroom home on a corner lot. Master down with open concept kitchen, fireplace in the family room and formal living and dining rooms. The majestic Teton is designed for tranquil family living. Expansive outdoor space on the covered porch or patio ensures everyone can get outside to enjoy blue skies. Two of the three secondary bedrooms have a designated bath, keeping teens from squabbling over primping space. The primary suite is luxurious, as well as being adjacent to the study. Situated near the back, it’s a peaceful place to work. Turn the upstairs bedroom into a second home office so neither of you interrupts a Zoom meeting. The apex of the home is the upstairs entertainment complex with media and game rooms for family time. Then again, the heart of the home is still your gourmet kitchen. Midnight hot cocoa anyone?

In the evening, you can all watch shooting stars from your covered patio!

The Acadia makes a dramatic first impression. Central to the design is a lofty two-story family room flowing into a breathtaking kitchen and separate dining area. The game room is the perfect base camp for planning family adventures while scarfing down homemade trail mix!
